com.pilot.jword
Class ContentTree

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.ContentTree

public class ContentTree
extends java.lang.Object

Represents the content part of a document or a document piece which is meant to be inserted into some location within the document. With this structure one can construct document pieces programmatically and insert into document.

Nested Class Summary
 class ContentTree.Node
          represents elements within the content tree
